content.question:
A. Describe the key components of globalization.
B. Explain how organizations like the International Monetary Fund (IMF) or the World Trade Organization (WTO) can help promote globalization.
C. Explain how multinational corporations can have a negative impact on globalization.
D. Explain how governments can respond politically to the changes prompted by globalization.

frqParts.text:
A. Describe the key components of globalization.
B. Explain how organizations like the International Monetary Fund (IMF) or the World Trade Organization (WTO) can help promote globalization.
C. Explain how multinational corporations can have a negative impact on globalization.
D. Explain how governments can respond politically to the changes prompted by globalization.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.1: Impact of Global Economic and Technological Forces

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
